[b]Features[/b]:
Ã¢Å“â€ UNLIMITED DOWNLOAD SPEED!
Ã¢Å“â€ download single files from torrents with multiple files
Ã¢Å“â€ multiple torrent downloading, queuing
Ã¢Å“â€ search for torrents

Ã¢Å“â€ web browser integration
Ã¢Å“â€ magnet link support
Ã¢Å“â€ trackerless torrent (DHT) support
Ã¢Å“â€ RSS support(automatically download torrents published in feeds)
Ã¢Å“â€ UPnP and NAT-PMP support
Ã¢Å“â€ IP filtering support
Ã¢Å“â€ proxy support (SOCKS, HTTP)
Ã¢Å“â€ encryption
Ã¢Å“â€ Local Peer Discovery
Ã¢Å“â€ creating torrents

[b]What's New[/b]

[i]1.2.3.1[/i]
Fix FC on large devices when tapping on a status list item.
Ongoing notification: fixed blinking, expanded style can be switched off.
Uses own peer id: -tT1230-, will follow version number.
Fixed downloading RSS feeds from some sites.(like torrentz)
Verbose error messages in torrent items.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------


[b][size=4]aTorrent PRO - Torrent App v2.1.2.1-iLi[/size][/b]

aTorrent PRO - Native P2P BitTorrent Software for Android devices. Download files with ease right to your phone or tablet!
Professional (Ad-free) version.

[b]Features[/b]:

Ã¢Å“â€ Dark and Light themes
Ã¢Å“â€ Torrent search dialog
Ã¢Å“â€ Open torrents right from browser
Ã¢Å“â€ Magnet links support
Ã¢Å“â€ Add torrent from file
Ã¢Å“â€ Choose download folder
Ã¢Å“â€ Partial download (choose files from torrent)
Ã¢Å“â€ Multiple parallel downloading
Ã¢Å“â€ Option to limit downloads by Wi-Fi
Ã¢Å“â€ Option to pause downloads when external power supply is not connected
Ã¢Å“â€ Supported protocols: BitTorrent P2P, DHT, Advanced DHT Bootstrap, Magnet links, HTTP & UDP Trackers
Ã¢Å“â€ Large files support (for FAT32 SD cards - 4Gb maximum, for internal storage - unlimited file size)

[b]Coming soon[/b]:

Ã¢Å“â€ Many other features in development.

! If you have installed any Free RAM/Task manager application, then add aTorrent to it's exclusion list to avoid unloading from memory and stop downloading.

! Use High Speed (Class 10+) memory cards for downloading to prevent lags.

[b]What's New[/b]

[i]2.1.2.1[/i]
- some bugs fixed

[i]2.1.2.0[/i]
-welcome page introduced instead of empty torrent list
-"Minimum battery level" setting added to PRO version
-Magnet links demagnetization improved
-"Proxy" setting added to PRO version
-Language selection added
-small changes in notification
-landscape mode introduced to phones
-load on system start now disabled by default
-annoying request to rate aTorrent now will be more patient
-some bugs fixed

[i]2.1.0.9[/i]
-libtorrent updated
-small fixes
